wikipedia_page.main: Bertha Henry Buxton (26 July 1844 – 1881) was an English novelist and children's author.

response: * Bertha Henry Buxton (1844–1881), British novelist and children's author

Initially a penny weekly, the Family Herald later sold at 2d. Contributors included James George Stuart Burges Bohn, Charlotte Mary Brame (1836–84), Bertha Henry Buxton, William Carpenter, James Hain Friswell, Fanny Aikin Kortright (1821–1900), Watts Phillips (1825–74), Frederick William Robinson (1830–1901), Nina Moore Jamieson (1885-1932), Henrietta Stannard (1856–1911), Annie Tinsley (1808–85)ODNB entry for each listed contributor and Mary Cecil Hay.
* Bertha Henry Buxton, née Leupold (1844 - 1881), a British novelist and children's author
